spec_data.Name: PolicyKit-olpc
spec_data.Description:
Software for the XO laptop requires some modification to the default policies
installed by certain applications. This package provides OLPC-specific
policy overrides.

You probably do not want to install this on non-XO systems.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:23:40 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
